title: Smart Data models TrackedTugService schema
description: Tug service from the Tracking System. The entityId follows the pattern mrn:urn:eshuv:pdph:sigo:type:attr:value, where type is the entity type (TugService), attr is the attribute used as the unique identifier (name), and value is its value (ExampleName).

id.description: Property. Unique identifier of the entity (MRN/URN).

type.description: Property. NGSI Entity type. It has to be TrackedTugService

observedDate.description: Property. Last update date of the entity. Represented in ISO 8601 UTC format.

refManeuverId.description: Property. Identifier of the tug maneuver.

startDate.description: Property. Start date/time of the tug maneuver. Represented in ISO 8601 UTC format.

endDate.description: Property. End date/time of the tug maneuver. Represented in ISO 8601 UTC format.

standBy.description: Property. Stand-by status for the tug maneuver (e.g., Yes/No).

startLocation.description: Property. Start location of the tug maneuver.

endLocation.description: Property. End location of the tug maneuver.
